meanings.definition: A bag with shoulder straps, carried on the back, used for carrying personal belongings.
meanings.sent1: I packed my lunch in my knapsack for the hike.
meanings.sent2: She slung her knapsack over her shoulders before heading to school.
meanings.sent3: The knapsack looked like a turtle shell on his back.
meanings.sent4: Her knapsack was a trusty companion on all her adventures.
meanings.sent5: The colorful knapsack stood out in the sea of backpacks.

meanings.definition: To pack or carry in a knapsack.
meanings.sent1: I will knapsack my snacks for the picnic.
meanings.sent2: They knapsack their essentials for the camping trip.
meanings.sent3: He decided to knapsack his books for the library visit.
meanings.sent4: She knapsacked her memories carefully as she moved houses.
meanings.sent5: The explorer knapsacked all the treasures he found on his journey.
